analyzed: @ga_@#/_/nag po chen po'i stod pa rngam pa
translated: The Praise of the Great Black One, the Terrifying

original: sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba/
translated: Sound

original: /  @/_ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i bstod pa lags/_@@#/_/rgya gar🔽skad du/_ma ha ka la ak+sho pa stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/_nag po chen po'i
analyzed: /  @/_ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i bstod pa lags/_@@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ka la ak+sho pa stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/_nag po chen po'i
translated: The Praise of the Six-Armed Wisdom Protector🔽In the Tibetan language, this is called: The Praise of the Great Black One, the Terrifying Sound

original: stod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba/_myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag
analyzed: stod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba/_myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag
translated: Homage to the Swift-Acting Avalokiteshvara!🔽Om! May it be accomplished! Hum!

original: 'tshhal lo/_/om grub par gyur cig_/hum dur khrod chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i🔽nang /_/tshhang tshhing 'khrigs pa tshan dan chen po'i tshhal/_/skal ba me ltar
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/om grub par gyur cig_/hum dur khrod chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i nang /_/tshhang tshhing 'khrigs pa tshan dan chen po'i tshhal/_/skal ba me ltar
translated: In the midst of the great, terrifying charnel ground,🔽In the great sandalwood forest filled with thick fog,🔽In the center of the expanse blazing like the fire of time,

original: 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/_/bgegs chen snol ba'i gdan la rab tu bzhengs/
analyzed: 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/_/bgegs chen snol ba'i gdan la rab tu bzhengs/
translated: You stand upon the seat of the great obstacle-makers piled up.🔽Mahakalarupa, the six-armed terrifying form,

original: ma ha ka la phyag drug 'jigs pa'i sku/_/sku'i cha lugs mi zad 'bar ba las/
analyzed: ma ha ka la phyag drug 'jigs pa'i sku/_/sku'i cha lugs mi zad 'bar ba las/
translated: From the blazing, inexhaustible attire of your body,🔽You are adorned with the charnel ground ornaments,

original: dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan pa po/_/gsung gi nga ro mi zad 'bar ba las//
analyzed: dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan pa po/_/gsung gi nga ro mi zad 'bar ba las//
translated: And from the blazing, inexhaustible roar of your speech,

original: hum dang phat kyi sgra'i stong gsum 'gengs/_/rnam dag thugs ni mi zad 'bar ba
analyzed: hum dang phat kyi sgra'i stong gsum 'gengs/_/rnam dag thugs ni mi zad 'bar ba
translated: worlds, and from the blazing, inexhaustible, pure mind

original: las/_/spros dang bral ba'i mtshhan ma spyir yang ston/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sgo🔽nas khyod la stod/_phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i gri gug gis/_/nyon mongs
analyzed: las/_/spros dang bral ba'i mtshhan ma spyir yang ston/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas khyod la stod/_phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i gri gug gis/_/nyon mongs
translated: you display the general sign of freedom from elaboration.🔽I praise you, O Vajravarahi, through your body, speech, and mind.🔽With the first of your right hands, you hold a curved knife🔽that cuts the afflictions of beings and raises them up as enemies.

original: rtshad nas bcad nas dgra la 'phyar/_/'phreng ba 'dzin pas skye 'gro rtshis la
analyzed: rtshad nas bcad nas dgra la 'phyar/_/'phreng ba 'dzin pas skye 'gro rtshis la
translated: With the one that holds a garland, you mark all beings with🔽the seal of life.

original: 'debs/_/da ma ru'i mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdud/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i
analyzed: 'debs/_/da ma ru'i mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdud/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i
translated: You bring the dakinis of the damarus under control.🔽I praise you, O transcendent one.🔽With the first of your left hands, you hold a skull cup filled with

original: gtsho la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag bsnams pa ni/_/
analyzed: gtsho la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag bsnams pa ni/_/
translated: blood,🔽which is the life-force of those who violate their sacred pledges,

original: dam nyams srog rtsha zhal du gsol ba po/_/mdung rtshe gsum pos khams gsum
analyzed: dam nyams srog rtsha zhal du gsol ba po/_/mdung rtshe gsum pos khams gsum
translated: which you consume. With the three spears in your other left🔽hands, you bring the three realms under control.

original: dbang du bsdud/_/zhags pas dam nyams ma lus 'ching bar mdzad/_/byin
analyzed: dbang du bsdud/_/zhags pas dam nyams ma lus 'ching bar mdzad/_/byin
translated: With the lasso, you bind all those who violate their sacred pledges.🔽I go for refuge to you, O treasure of blessings and spiritual powers.

original: brlabs dngos grub gter la skyabs su mchi/_/chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med
analyzed: brlabs dngos grub gter la skyabs su mchi/_/chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med
translated: I praise you, O unchanging dharmakaya.

original: brtags su/_/sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la/_/khrag 'dzag lnga bcu rtsha
analyzed: brtags su/_/sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la/_/khrag 'dzag lnga bcu rtsha
translated: In the tantra it says:🔽You are dark blue in color, blazing with light,🔽adorned with fifty blood-dripping heads,

original: lngas brgyan pa po/_/stag gi lpags pa sbrul gyis chun pos mdzes/_/ma ha ka la khyod
analyzed: lngas brgyan pa po/_/stag gi lpags pa sbrul gyis chun pos mdzes/_/ma ha ka la khyod
translated: beautiful with a tiger skin and a snake belt,🔽Mahākāla, I pay homage to you.🔽Upon a seat of the crushed bodies of piśācas,

original: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/byi na yak+sha gnol ba'i gdan steng na/_/krig krig zhabs kyi
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/byi na yak+sha gnol ba'i gdan steng na/_/krig krig zhabs kyi
translated: with your feet stamping and crushing,🔽you reduce enemies and obstructors to dust.

original: dgra bgegs thal bar klog_/zhal gdengs mche ba brtshigs shing rngam pa yis/_/
analyzed: dgra bgegs thal bar klog_/zhal gdengs mche ba brtshigs shing rngam pa yis/_/
translated: With your gaping mouth, bared fangs, and wrathful expression,🔽you draw out the blood of the hearts of oath-breakers and consume it.

original: dam nyams khong khrag 'dren cing zhal du gsol/_/spyan gsum me ltar 'bar zhing
analyzed: dam nyams khong khrag 'dren cing zhal du gsol/_/spyan gsum me ltar 'bar zhing
translated: Your three eyes blaze like fire,

original: sgrad pa yis/_/khams gsum dbang du bsdud cing rtshis la 'debs/_/dbu skra
analyzed: sgrad pa yis/_/khams gsum dbang du bsdud cing rtshis la 'debs/_/dbu skra
translated: subjugating the three realms and striking with your bolt of lightning.🔽Upon the crown of your head, with blazing hair piled up,

original: 'bar ba rdzes pa'i spyi bo na/_/mi skyod rgyal po rab tu brgyan pa po/_/dbang
analyzed: 'bar ba rdzes pa'i spyi bo na/_/mi skyod rgyal po rab tu brgyan pa po/_/dbang
translated: is the fully adorned King Akṣobhya.🔽I pay homage to you, who are fully endowed with the four empowerments.

original: bzhi yongs su rdzogs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/hum bzhengs cig bzhengs cig chos kyi
analyzed: bzhi yongs su rdzogs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/hum bzhengs cig bzhengs cig chos kyi
translated: Hūṃ! Arise! Arise! You who are the embodiment of the dharmakāya,

original: dbyings nas bzhengs/_/bskul lo bskul lo 'gro ba'i don la bskul/_/thugs
analyzed: dbyings nas bzhengs/_/bskul lo bskul lo 'gro ba'i don la bskul/_/thugs
translated: I invoke you, I invoke you, for the sake of beings,🔽Stir the depths of your heart, and perform your wrathful activity.

original: dam rgyud bskul 'phrin las gnyan po mdzod/_/ma g.yel ma g.yel dpal ldan
analyzed: dam rgyud bskul 'phrin las gnyan po mdzod/_/ma g.yel ma g.yel dpal ldan
translated: Do not be distracted, do not be distracted, glorious Mahākāla,🔽In the presence of the protector Śākyasiṃha,

original: nag po che/_/skyob pa shakya seng ge'i spyan mnga' ru/_/bstan pa srung bar khas
analyzed: nag po che/_/skyob pa shakya seng ge'i spyan mnga' ru/_/bstan pa srung bar khas
translated: You promised to protect the teachings,

original: blang dam bcas pa'i/_/las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/_/skyes bu
analyzed: blang dam bcas pa'i/_/las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/_/skyes bu
translated: So make these activities fruitful.

original: dam pa blo dang ldan pa yi/_/bstod pa 'di yis lan cig stod byas nas/_/pha ma bu
analyzed: dam pa blo dang ldan pa yi/_/bstod pa 'di yis lan cig stod byas nas/_/pha ma bu
translated: If you praise this excellent being, endowed with intelligence,🔽Even once, Mahākāla will protect you

original: tshha rnams la brtshe ba bzhin/_/nag po chen pos brtag tu bsrung bar mdzod/_/🔽nag po chen po'i bstod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis
analyzed: tshha rnams la brtshe ba bzhin/_/nag po chen pos brtag tu bsrung bar mdzod/_/ nag po chen po'i bstod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis
translated: As if you were his own children.🔽The Praise of Mahākāla called “Roaring Sound”

original: nag po chen po'i stod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba
analyzed: nag po chen po'i stod pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba
translated: The Praise of Mahākāla called “Roaring Sound”

original: /  mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: /  mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is completed.
